name: Schema Plugin For Divi, Gutenberg & Shortcodes
author: wpt00ls

sections.description:
Improve your website’s search results ranking and click-through-rates (CTR) by integrating JSON-LD schema code. Works with all search engines.

SEO is an integral part of every website. Improving visibility on search engines can do wonders to the growth of your business.

This plugin aim to make SEO creation process easy. Included are shortcodes, divi modules & gutenberg blocks that make use of the schema data. No programming experience needed.

Schema’s Available

  • Organization Schema
    • Add “Organization Schema” To WordPress
  • Article Schema
    • Add “Article Schema” To WordPress
  • Breadcrumb Schema
    • Add “Breadcrumb Schema” To WordPress
    • Breadcrumb Divi Module (premium)
  • FAQ Schema (premium)
    • Add “FAQ Schema” To WordPress
    • FAQ Grid Divi Module
  • Local Business
    • Add “Local Business Schema” To WordPress
    • “Address Shortcode” For Local Business Schema In WordPress
    • “Opening Hours Shortcode” For Local Business Schema In WordPress
    • Google “Map Shortcode” For Local Business Schema In WordPress
    • Google Maps “Store Locator Shortcode” Using Local Business Schema Data In WordPress
  • HowTo Schema (premium)
    • Add “HowTo Schema” To WordPress
    • HowTo Divi Module
  • Covid-19 Special Announcement Schema (premium)
    • Add “Covid-19 Special Announcement Schema” To WordPress
    • Covid-19 Special Announcement Divi Module

Schema – Work In Progress

  • Local Business
  • Restaurant Menu
  • Product
  • Recipe
  • Video
  • Job Posting
  • Event

and more…

Premium Plugin

https://wptools.app/wordpress-plugin/wordpress-schema-plugin-for-divi-gutenberg-shortcodes/
sections.installation:
How to install the WordPress Schema Plugin For Divi, Gutenberg & Shortcodes plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload wp-structured-data-schema to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What is Article schema & how is it useful?

Article Schema adds structured data to your news, blog and sport article page.

Article schema can increase the changes of your page appearing in SERPs with rich snippets.

What is Breadcrumb schema & how is it useful?

BreadcrumbList schema markup generates breadcrumb rich snippets on your search engine result pages (SERPs)

They are good for SEO as they make navigation easier. A user visits lot more pages before exiting. It results in lower bounce rates.

What is Local Business schema & how is it useful?

Local Business Schema provides your business information to search engines in structured format.

With this, your business stands to gain being featured in local search queries like “find the nearest gas station”

What is FAQ schema & how is it useful?

FAQ Schema page contains a list of frequently asked questions and answers.

Implementing FAQ Schema more often than not leads to search engines showing rich snippets on SERP.

What is HowTo Schema & how is it useful?

A How To Schema is a set of step-by-step instructions for your users.

HowTo schema pages are eligible for rich snippets on SERPs

What is Organization Schema & how is it useful?

Organization Schema adds schema data information about your business. This

Organization schema can increase the changes of your page appearing in SERPs with rich snippets and knowledge graph.

What is Covid-19 Special Announcement Schema & how is it useful?

Covid-19 pandemic has disrupted schedules and other aspects of everyday life.

It affects day-to-day activity of businesses and organizations. Businesses need to announce about any disruptions.

Such announcements could in the form of

  • Temporary closure notice
  • Travel restrictions
  • Revised hours
  • General guidelines etc

Search engines provides SpecialAnnouncement schema data. It shows the announcement as a rich snippet on SERP.

Credits

  • Carbon Fields
  • Carbon Breadcrumbs
  • Pimple DI Container
sections.changelog:
4.3.0

  • Compatible with WordPress 6.6
  • Fixed issues with settings app and new react changes

4.2.0

  • Fixed incompatibility with WordPress 6.5 which caused a critical error.

4.1.0

  • php8.1 compatible
  • WordPress compatible
  • Freemius upgrade

4.0.3

  • Freemius Upgrade

4.0.2

  • Freemius SDK upgrade.
  • WordPress 6.2 compatible

4.0.1

  • Added lastmod field to sitemaps
  • Freemius SDK upgrade

4.0.0

  • Added sitemap support

3.6.2

  • Added ‘Author URL’ field to author schema.
  • Upgraded freemius.

3.6.1

  • Fixed critical error with divi modules
  • Freemius SDK upgraded

3.6.0

  • Added Local Business Schema
  • Added wpt_schema_local_business_address shortcode to display business address with additional details.
  • Added wpt_schema_local_business_opening_hours shortcode to display opening hours for a business location.
  • Added wpt_schema_local_business_map to display map of a local business.
  • Added wpt_schema_local_business_store_locator to display a store locator for multiple business addresses.
  • Added Local Business Address divi module. It uses the wpt_schema_local_business_address shortcode
  • Added Local Business Hours divi module. It uses the wpt_schema_local_business_opening_hours shortcode

3.5.1

Fix for ‘Fixed Image Field’ where selected image url was not being reflected in settings.

3.5.0

Added wpt_schema_howto shortcode to display HowTo Schema user interface.
Added HowTo divi module

3.4.0

Added wpt_schema_faq_list shortcode
Added FAQ Grid divi module

3.3.0

Added divi module for Covid-19 Special Announcement

3.2.0

Added shortcode for Covid-19 Special Announcement

3.1.0

Added Divi Breadcrumb Module

3.0.0

Added breadcrumb shortcode wpt_schema_breadcrumbs

2.0.0

Added schema settings for breadcrumb, organization, special announcement, faq and how-to with their schema markup creation.

1.0.0

Created schema settings app page
